attributes.action: Stop the practice of illegally spacing car number plates to create personalised registrations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming more and more difficult to read car registration plates due to the increasing practice of incorrectly spacing numbers and letters to result in personalised registrations.
I would like to see a more stringent approach to enforcing the law in the area.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Reg-Plates/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
